channel.title: Its not programming, but Website:
channel.description:
Hey :)
Im new at servermaking and these forums so dont fuck me down everytime please. mabye you lough about my questions, so dont talk to me negative just dont post here then
[size=36pt]QUESTIPON[/size]
[size=8pt]Well, how to put a server on website? I got the sources and the client files on my computer now. is there any code to put on website? or ... sry.. i know your loughing now.. :p[/size]

item.title: Its not programming, but Website:
item.dc:creator: @teufel teufel
item.description:
@teufel wrote:

[quote=“Sanskrit, post:9, topic:366507”]I will answer your QUESTIPON. Change where the client grabs the cache from, remove the cache and .java from the files, create a manifest file of the main class “Client”, then jar the client files. After that just sign the jar and add it to your webpage like so.

[code]

QUESTIPON CLIENT

[/code] Done :D[/quote] 

<applet name="Questipon Client" width="765" height="503" archive="client.jar"

lol’d

Read full topic

item.title: Its not programming, but Website:
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

I will answer your QUESTIPON. Change where the client grabs the cache from, remove the cache and .java from the files, create a manifest file of the main class “Client”, then jar the client files. After that just sign the jar and add it to your webpage like so.

[code]

QUESTIPON CLIENT

[/code] Done :D

Read full topic
